column2: "Na Ahab kaa dza Elija yɛe no nyinara kyerɛɛ Jezebel
column3: na mbrɛ osii dze afona kum nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara."

column2: "Nna Jezebel somaa ɔbɔfo ma ɔkɔr Elija nkyɛn dɛ
column3: Dɛm na enyame no nyɛ me
column5: sɛ ɔkyena sisei na memmaa wo nkwa nnyɛɛ dɛ hɔn mu baako no nkwa a."
na okodur Beer-seba a ɔyɛ Juda dze no
column6: na ogyaa n’akowaa no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔno noara dze osii mu kɔr sar no do da kor kwan
column3: na ɔkɔree kɛtsenaa ɔsɛsɛ dua bi ase: na ɔserɛe maa noho dɛ nkyɛ onwu; na ɔsee dɛ
column5: yi mo nkwa; na minnye mennsen m’egyanom."

column2: "Na ɔdaa famu dae wɔ ɔsɛsɛ dua bi ase; na

column5: tatar a wɔato no wɔ gyansenama do
column6: na nsu kɔɔpow si n’etsifi. Na odzidzii na ɔnomee

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no baa bio otsia mpɛn ebien no
column4: Soɛr dzidzi; na akwantu no war dodow ma wo."
na ɔnantsewee wɔ edziban no n’ahoɔdzen mu kɔr Nyankopɔn ne bepɔw Horeb ho adaduanan

column2: "Na ɔbaa hɔ ɔbo tu bi ho

column4: dɔm Nyankopɔn ho nyinkun na matwe; osiandɛ Israelmba apow w’ahyɛmu
column6: na wɔdze afona ekuku wo nkɔnhyɛfo: na emi
column8: na maka; na wɔrohwehwɛ mo so woeeku me."

column4: na kegyina bepɔw no do wɔ EWURADZE enyim. Na
column7: na mframa kɛse dzendzen paapaa mbepɔw mu
column8: na obubuu abotan mu esinesin dzii EWURADZE enyim; naaso nna EWURADZE nnyi mframa no mu: na mframa no ekyir asaasewosow a; na EWURADZE nnyi asaasewosow no mu:"

column2: "na asaasewosow no ekyir ogya a; na EWURADZE nnyi ogya no mu: na ogya no ekyir ndze bɔkɔɔ bi a."

column5: na opuei kegyinaa ɔbo tu no n’ahɛnee. Na hwɛ

column4: dɔm Nyankopɔn ho nyinkun na matwe; na Israelmba apow w’ahyɛmu
column6: na wɔdze afona ekuku wo nkɔnhyɛfo; na emi
column7: emi ara nko na maka; na wɔrohwehwɛ mo so woeeku me."

column4: san fa wo kwan kɔ Damaskɔs sar no do: na sɛ idu a
column5: sera Hazael ngo hyɛ no hen wɔ Siria do:"

column2: "na sera Nimsi ne babanyin Jehu ngo hyɛ no hen wɔ Israel do: na sera Safat ne babanyin Elisha a ofi Abel-mehola no ngo hyɛ no nkɔnhyɛnyi dzi w’ananmu."

column3: nyia obefi nsa efi Hazael afona anomu no
column4: Jehu boku no: na nyia obefi nsa efi Jehu afona anomu no Elisha boku no."

column2: "Naaso mibegyaa Israel mu mpemesuon ama moho
column3: anankoroma nyinara a wommbui mmaa Baal
column4: na ano biara a ɔmmfeew n’ano."

column3: na okohun Safat ne ba Elisha a ɔdze anantwi mpamho duebien dzi n’enyim rufuntum
column4: na ɔnoara ka dza otsia duebien no ho: na Elija twaa mu kɔr ne nkyɛn na ɔtoow n’akatakɔnmu guu no do."

column3: na otuu mbirika dzii Elija ekyir
column6: ma menkɛfew m’egya na me na ano
column7: na nkyii mimbedzi w’ekyir. Na ɔsee no dɛ
column8: Kɔ bra; na ebɛnadze na medze mayɛ wo?"

column5: na ɔdze anantwi edwumayɛ ndua no noaa nam no
column7: na wodzii. Nna ɔsoɛree kedzii Elija ekyir
